name: Mountain Peaks
description: Climb higher with increased complexity and stunning mountain vistas
author: Puzzle Team

intro.title: The Mountain Path
intro.content: Leaving the peaceful garden behind, you begin your ascent into the mountains. The air grows crisp and thin, and ancient stone puzzles block your path. Each solved arrangement seems to unlock ancient knowledge carved into the mountainside.

midpoint.title: Ancient Wisdom
midpoint.content: Halfway up the mountain, you discover ruins of an ancient temple. The stone tiles seem to hold memories of those who climbed before you. You sense that mastering these puzzles will grant you access to deeper mysteries.

completion.title: Summit Achievement
completion.content: From the mountain peak, you can see vast oceans in the distance, their depths calling to you. The mountain spirits have deemed you worthy of the next challenge. The path forward leads down toward those mysterious waters.

puzzles.name: Stone Steps
puzzles.description: Navigate the first stone puzzle on your mountain ascent
puzzles.hintText: Mountain climbing requires patience. Plan each step carefully.

puzzles.name: Rocky Trail
puzzles.description: Follow the winding path through rocky terrain
puzzles.hintText: The trail markers show the way - follow the natural flow of the rocks.

puzzles.name: Crystal Cave
puzzles.description: Arrange the crystal formations to unlock the cave passage
puzzles.hintText: Crystals resonate with each other - look for matching patterns.

puzzles.name: Wind Patterns
puzzles.description: Master the mountain winds to arrange the weather stones
puzzles.hintText: Mountain winds have their own rhythm - work with nature, not against it.

puzzles.name: Ancient Temple
puzzles.description: Unlock the secrets of the mountain temple
puzzles.hintText: Ancient builders thought in sacred geometry - look for divine proportions.

puzzles.name: Avalanche Path
puzzles.description: Carefully navigate through the unstable snow field
puzzles.hintText: One wrong move could trigger an avalanche - plan your entire route first.

puzzles.name: Eagle's Nest
puzzles.description: Arrange the stones to please the mountain eagles
puzzles.hintText: Eagles see patterns from above - think about the view from the sky.

puzzles.name: Thunder Peak
puzzles.description: Harness the power of mountain storms
puzzles.hintText: Lightning illuminates the correct path - watch for the electrical patterns.

bonusObjectives.name: Storm Master
bonusObjectives.description: Complete during a lightning storm sequence

puzzles.name: Summit Challenge
puzzles.description: Reach the ultimate peak of mountain puzzle mastery
puzzles.hintText: From the summit, all paths become clear. Use everything you've learned.

bonusObjectives.name: Peak Performance
bonusObjectives.description: Complete the entire mountain level in under 2 hours

bonusObjectives.name: Summit Master
bonusObjectives.description: Reach the summit with perfect efficiency on final puzzle

bonusObjectives.name: Mountain Legend
bonusObjectives.description: Complete without using any hints in the entire level

achievements.name: Mountain Climber
achievements.description: Begin your ascent by completing the first 3 mountain puzzles

achievements.name: Temple Explorer
achievements.description: Discover the secrets of the ancient temple

achievements.name: Mountain Sage
achievements.description: Complete the mountain level with wisdom and efficiency

achievements.name: Storm Rider
achievements.description: Master the Thunder Peak during a storm

level3.description: Complete 7 mountain puzzles to unlock the Ocean Depths

screenReaderDescriptions.5: Ancient temple stones with sacred geometric markings
screenReaderDescriptions.6: Snow block arrangement in unstable avalanche-prone pattern
screenReaderDescriptions.7: Aerial perspective stone arrangement visible from eagle's height
screenReaderDescriptions.8: Lightning-charged stones with electrical field patterns
screenReaderDescriptions.9: Five by five summit crystal arrangement with panoramic mountain view

audioDescriptions.windSounds: Mountain wind intensity varies with puzzle difficulty
audioDescriptions.crystalResonance: Crystal tiles produce harmonic tones when correctly placed
audioDescriptions.thunderEffects: Lightning provides audio-visual hints for correct moves
audioDescriptions.eagleCalls: Eagle cries signal successful pattern recognition
